level.heading: Cross References
level.text: Horizontal property regimes, tax exemptions, classification, see ยง 42-2016.

level.heading: Editor's Notes
level.text: Section 5(a) of D.C. Law 7-29 redesignated this section as ยง 47-1801.1a (ยง 47-1801.01a, 2001 Ed.).
